title: adding all documents, not just collapsed ones, to the collapsed document group would give us resultset wide aggregate functions like sum/avg/etc
description:
Suggest we add functionality to allow inclusion of non-collapsed document in the collapseCount and aggregate function values of field collapsing (solr-236)

ie include ALL documents, not just the collapsed ones, possibly via some parameter like collapse.includeAllDocs?

I think this would be a great addition to the collapse code (and solr functionality), via what I would think is a small change, since solr doesnt have any other aggregation mechanism (as yet)
